Articles.Content: Trying to get a new part to work and I am having some issues with it spamming the log with NRE messages about a Game Object not being set to a object or something like that. Anybody have ideas on how to correct it?
Yes, you have to do "something". Can we have a measure of detail?

Yes, you have to do "something". Can we have a measure of detail?

Actually I already found the error I had made.

Actually I already found the error I had made.

Ok then, share with others who might have the same problem.

Ok then, share with others who might have the same problem.

Well for me it was just a simple error in my Unity setup. I didn't have the part mesh under a GameObject. Fixed that and it all works.

EDIT: Ok so it seems it wasn't THAT simple. It fixed one part but not the other two.

Edited July 30, 2014 by JewelShisen

And solved! Was combo of error im my making the part in Unity as well as me using a bad cfg file.

So for anybody else, make sure if you copy a cfg for a part you make that if the source part was animated that your part is the same.
